metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5011 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The parse_dos_extended function in partitions/dos.c in the libblkid library in util-linux allows physically proximate attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a crafted MSDOS partition table with an extended partition boot record at zero offset.

criterions.comment: util-linux package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.33.1-0.1ubuntu2').
